settings.heading: PRO vs Standard Comparison
settings.content:
The main difference is that the PRO chiller is more powerful & cools 2x faster. The PRO is a must choice if you live in a warm climate area with temperatures above 77°F (25°C).

PRO Chiller (1/2 hp):

  • Perfect for professional athletes and those in hotter climates (above 77 °F / 25 °C).
  • Enhanced cooling performance, lowering water temperature to an invigorating 39 F - 49 F (depending if used indoors or outdoors)
  • Consistent water temperature maintenance.
  • Rapid water cooling, reducing preparation time.
  • Weighs 48 lbs (22 kg) with an increased 1200W cooling power, while maintaining easy setup and portability.
  • Superior durability to withstand the demands of high-performance usage.
  • Low noise operation for a peaceful cold plunge experience.
  • User-friendly controls for temperature adjustments.
  • Portable and easy to set up

Standard Chiller (1/3 hp):

  • For beginners and recreational users.
  • Designed for medium to low-temperature climates.
  • Can cool water down to 55 - 60 °F (15 °C).
  • Weighs 37lbs (17 kg) with 600W cooling power.
  • Consistent water temperature maintenance.
  • User-friendly controls for temperature adjustments.
  • Low noise operation for a peaceful cold plunge experience.
  • Portable and easy to set up

settings.heading: Water Chiller Specifications
settings.content:
Pro - 1/2 Hp Water Chiller:

  • Power: Ultra-efficient 1/2 HP compressor, consuming 1200W for optimal energy savings. Voltage - Standard US 110V/60hz.
  • Temperature: Can cool water to 39 - 49 °F for the best ice bath experience.
  • Weight: A lightweight 55 lbs (25 kg), making it easy to transport and position.
  • Dimensions: Measuring 13x13x15in / (34x34x37cm), our chiller is designed for effortless mobility and placement.
  • Coating: Matte black corrosion resistant paint on a steel box & frame.
  • Indoor/Outdoor use: The water chiller can be used outdoors, but we recommend covering it, so it doesn't get dirt or water on it.

Standard - 1/3 Hp Water Chiller:

  • Power: Energy-efficient 1/3 HP compressor, consuming only 600W for optimal energy savings. Voltage - Standard US 110V/60hz.
  • Temperature: Can cool water to 55 - 60 °F (15°C)
  • Weight: A lightweight 37lbs (17 kg), making it easy to transport and position.
  • Dimensions: Measuring 12x12x13in / (29x29x32cm), our chiller is designed for effortless mobility and placement.
  • Coating: Matte black corrosion resistant paint on a steel box & frame.
  • Indoor/Outdoor use: The water chiller can be used outdoors, but we recommend covering it, so it doesn't get dirt or water on it.

Example of power usage: The water chiller won't hike up your energy bill. It uses the same technology and compressor your fridge/freezer at home uses, which is super economical.

At 77°F (25°C) room temperature, and chiller temperature set at 41°F (5°C) will consume around 5 kWh per day. With today's average kWh in the USA, that is just around $1.3 at most per day in electricity cost to run Spartan ice bath water chiller for 8 hours.

Spartan Ice Bath Specifications:

Diameter: 31 inches (75 cm)

Height: 31 inches (75 cm)

Weight: 7 lb (3 kg)

Capacity: 80 gal (300L)

The ice bath is suitable for heights up to 6′9 (2.1m)

settings.heading: Shipping Info
settings.content:
The water chillers are in stock! Compared to our competitors, we offer the fastest delivery time.

Shipping is FREE to the USA and Canada.

Shipping takes between 7 - 14 business days after we dispatch the order. We dispatch all orders within 2 - 5 business days.

Please be patient with us while we send you the tracking details to your email. You can track your order from the menu "Track Your Order". The shipping times are working/business days.

We use the shipping couriers FedEx & UPS. You will get an estimated time of the delivery from their website after you receive the tracking number.

settings.heading: Return Policy
settings.content:
If you are unhappy with your water chiller for any reason, or it doesn't live up to your expectations, you have 30 days to return it for a full refund. 

We charge a restocking fee. Please refer to our Refunds & Returns page for more information.

You'll have to pay for the cost to ship it back to us, the estimated return cost for the chiller in the USA is $80 USD. You can test and use the water chiller, but in case of returning it, we kindly ask that you return it in good condition, dry, and in its original packaging.

After we receive it at our warehouse, you'll get a full refund within 3-5 business days. Please contact us at support@spartanicebath.com for more information or to start your return.

settings.heading: Improves Physical Recovery and Overall Health
settings.row_content: A meta-analysis of cold-water immersion effects on recovery found that cold exposure can be a highly effective recovery tool after high-intensity exercise or endurance training. Short interval (< 3 mins), cold water immersion demonstrated positive outcomes for muscle power, perceived recovery, and decreased muscle soreness (in part due to a reduction in circulating creatine kinase).

settings.heading: Strengthens You Mentally
settings.row_content: By forcing yourself to embrace the stress of cold exposure as a meaningful self-directed challenge (i.e., stressor), you exert what is called 'top-down control' over deeper brain centers that regulate reflexive states. This top-down control process involves your prefrontal cortex – an area of your brain involved in planning and suppressing impulsivity. That 'top-down' control is the basis of what people refer to when they talk about "resilience and grit." Importantly, it is a skill that carries over to situations outside of the deliberate cold environment, allowing you to cope better and maintain a calm, clear mind when confronted with real-world stressors. In other words, deliberate cold exposure is great training for the mind.

settings.heading: Increases Your Metabolism
settings.row_content: Cold exposure increases metabolism as the body has to burn calories to increase core body temperature. The conversion of white fat (energy storage) to beige or brown fat (which are highly metabolically active) can be beneficial for triggering further and more sustained increases in metabolism

settings.heading: Elevates Your Mood And Energy
settings.row_content: Cold exposure causes the prolonged release of dopamine. Dopamine is a powerful molecule capable of elevating mood, enhancing focus, attention, goal-directed behavior, etc. Even short bouts of cold exposure can cause a lasting increase in dopamine and sustained elevation of mood, energy, and focus.

settings.heading: Improves The Quality Of Your Sleep
settings.row_content: Cold exposure can have significant effects on your circadian rhythm and quality of sleep. The circadian rhythm is the body's natural internal clock that regulates sleep and wakefulness. Exposure to cold can help regulate the circadian rhythm by promoting the release of the hormone melatonin, which is critical for the sleep-wake cycle. In terms of sleep quality, exposure to cold temperatures can increase the amount of slow-wave sleep, which is the deep, restorative sleep that is critical for physical and mental health

settings.heading: Health Benefits of Ice Baths

settings.heading: How to set up the water chiller (instructional video)
What is your lead/shipping time?
settings.row_content: Our shipping time is 7 - 14 business days to the USA and Canada. We dispatch within 2 - 5 business days.

settings.heading: Is this water chiller going to hike up my electricity bill?
settings.row_content:
No, the chiller will not rack up high energy bills. It uses the same technology as your fridge/freezer at home, which is extremely economical.

The exact power usage varies based on climate but expect to spend around $0.5-$1.5 per day in electricity (10 times less than buying ice if you plunge regularly!).

One of the best long term investments you can make for your health and your family.

settings.heading: How quiet is the Spartan Water Chiller during operation?
settings.row_content: The Spartan Water Chiller is designed for quiet operation. We've prioritized ensuring that your cold plunge sessions are as peaceful as possible. Thanks to our advanced engineering, the chiller operates with minimal noise, allowing you to relax and rejuvenate without any disruptions, making it a top choice for both indoor and outdoor settings.

settings.heading: Is the chiller compatible with my current Ice Bath?
settings.row_content:
The water chiller is compatible with all ice baths on the market!

We include instructional easy to understand video with your order.

If you have any questions please email us at support@spartanicebath.com

settings.heading: How long does it take to cool down the water?
settings.row_content: The Spartan Water Chiller PRO can cool water to the desired temperature in as little as 4 hours, depending on the starting temperature, your climate/room temperature and the water volume. If you live in a warmer climate, the chiller might take 6 - 8 hours to cool down the water.

settings.heading: How often I should change the water filter?
settings.row_content: We recommend changing the water filter once every month. Easy video instructions are included in the manual on how to do that. You can purchase extra filters from the Accessories page.

settings.heading: Can I use the chiller in a regular bathtub?
settings.row_content: Yes, you can use the chiller with your home bathtub. Just put both hoses over the top and you are ready.

settings.heading: What temperatures can the Spartan Water Chiller achieve?
settings.row_content: The Spartan PRO Water Chiller can cool water to an exhilarating 39 F - 49 F without the need for adding ice. The Standard version can do 55 - 60 F. The temperatures depend on the environment and water volume. The lowest temperatures are not guaranteed.

settings.heading: Is the chiller suitable for both indoor and outdoor use?
settings.row_content: Yes, the Spartan Water Chiller is versatile and designed for both indoor and outdoor usage. When used outdoors, make sure to keep it covered with an umbrella or something else as it is not waterproof.

settings.heading: How long does it take to set up the chiller?
settings.row_content: The chiller is user-friendly and can be set up in just 5 minutes. Both video guide and text manual are included to assist you.

settings.heading: What's the difference between the PRO Chiller and the Standard Chiller?
settings.row_content: The PRO Chiller offers enhanced cooling performance, consistent water temperature maintenance, and rapid water cooling. The Standard Chiller is designed for beginners and recreational users, providing cooling down to 55 - 60 °F.

settings.heading: What is the ice bath size?
settings.row_content:
Diameter: 31 inches (75 cm)

Height: 31 inches (75 cm)

Weight: 7 lb (3 kg)

Capacity: 80 gal (300L)

The ice bath is suitable for heights up to 6′9 (2.1m)

settings.heading: How do I drain the ice bath?
settings.row_content: The Ice Bath has a drain tap at the bottom, so you can easily drain it.

settings.heading: Is it 110V, do I need anything additional to run it?
settings.row_content: The chiller is made for US and Canada home sockets 110V. It is a standard plug and you don't need anything extra. Just plug it in your socket and that is it.
